import React from 'react'; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Card, Button } from 'react-bootstrap'; import Rating from '../components/Products/Rating'; import products from "../products"; const ProductScreen = ({ match }) => { const product = products.find(p => p._id === match.params.id) return ( <> Go Back

{product.name}

 Price: Rs.{product.price} Description: {product.description} Price: Rs.{product.price} Status: {product.countInStock > 0 ? 'In Stock' : 'Out of Stock'} ) } export default ProductScreen
